verses.t: And{G2532} when the sabbath{G3588} was past{G1230}, Mary{G3137} Magdalene{G3588}, and{G2532} Mary{G3137} the{G3588} mother of James{G3588}, and{G2532} Salome{G4539}, had bought{G59} sweet spices{G759}, that{G2443} they might come{G2064} and anoint{G218} him{G846}.
And{G2532} very{G3029} early in the morning{G4404} the first{G1520} day of the week{G4521}, they came{G2064} unto{G1909} the sepulchre{G3588} at the rising{G393} of the sun{G3588}.
And{G2532} they said{G3004} among{G4314} themselves{G1438}, Who{G5101} shall roll{G617} us{G2254} away{G617} the stone{G3588} from{G1537} the door{G3588} of the sepulchre{G3588}?
And{G2532} when they looked{G308}, they saw{G2334} that{G3754} the stone{G3588} was rolled away{G617}: for{G1063} it was{G2258} very{G4970} great{G3173}.

And{G2532} entering{G1525} into{G1519} the sepulchre{G3588}, they saw{G1492} a young man{G3495} sitting{G2521} on{G1722} the right side{G1188}, clothed{G4016} in a long{G4749} white{G3022} garment{G4749}; and{G2532} they were affrighted{G1568}.

And{G1161} he saith{G3004} unto them{G846}, Be{G1568} not{G3361} affrighted{G1568}: Ye seek{G2212} Jesus{G2424} of Nazareth{G3588}, which{G3588} was crucified{G4717}: he is risen{G1453}; he is{G2076} not{G3756} here{G5602}: behold{G1492} the place{G3588} where{G3699} they laid{G5087} him{G846}.

But{G235} go your way{G5217}, tell{G2036} his{G846} disciples{G3588} and{G2532} Peter{G3588} that{G3754} he goeth before{G4254} you{G5209} into{G1519} Galilee{G3588}: there{G1563} shall ye see{G3700} him{G846}, as{G2531} he said{G2036} unto you{G5213}.

And{G2532} they went out{G1831} quickly{G5035}and fled{G5343} from{G575} the sepulchre{G3588}; for{G1161} they{G846} trembled{G5156} and{G2532} were amazed{G1611}: neither{G2532} said they{G2036} any thing{G3762} to any{G3762} man; for{G1063} they were afraid{G5399}.

Now when{G1161} Jesus was risen{G450} early{G4404} the first{G4413} day of the week{G4521}, he appeared{G5316} first{G4412} to Mary{G3137} Magdalene{G3588}, out of{G575} whom{G3739} he had cast{G1544} seven{G2033} devils{G1140}.
And she went{G4198} and told{G518} them that{G1565} had been{G1096} with{G3326} him{G846}, as they mourned{G3996} and{G2532} wept{G2799}.
And they{G2548}, when they had heard{G191} that{G3754} he was alive{G2198}, and{G2532} had been seen{G2300} of{G5259} her{G846}, believed not{G569}.
After{G3326} that{G5023} he appeared{G5319} in{G1722} another{G2087} form{G3444} unto two{G1417} of{G1537} them{G846}, as they walked{G4043}, and went{G4198} into{G1519} the country{G68}.
And they{G2548} went{G565} and told{G518} it unto the residue{G3062}: neither{G3761} believed they{G4100} them{G1565}.

Afterward{G5305} he appeared{G5319} unto the eleven{G1733} as they{G846} sat at meat{G345}, and{G2532} upbraided{G3679} them with their{G846} unbelief{G3588} and{G2532} hardness of heart{G4641}, because{G3754} they believed{G4100} not{G3756} them which{G3588} had seen{G2300} him{G846} after he was risen{G1453}.
And{G2532} he said{G2036} unto them{G846}, Go ye{G4198} into{G1519} all{G537} the world{G3588}, and preach{G2784} the gospel{G3588} to every{G3956} creature{G3588}.
He{G3588} that believeth{G4100} and{G2532} is baptized{G907} shall be saved{G4982}; but{G1161} he{G3588} that believeth not{G569} shall be damned{G2632}.

And{G1161} these{G5023} signs{G4592} shall follow{G3877} them{G3588} that believe{G4100}; In{G1722} my{G3450} name{G3588} shall they cast out{G1544} devils{G1140}; they shall speak{G2980} with new{G2537} tongues{G1100};
